name: Death's Gambit (itch)
description:
Death's Gambit is a short card game between you and a unique guest. You both play for a special price, but the question is, who wins?

Join the discord server for development, questions, an amazing community, and to say hi!

Features:

  • Short play through time (depends on reading speed)
  • Art provided by Eli (Addictivities).
  • Music/audio by The Miracle Forest.
  • Easy controls (point-and-click).
  • Around 3k words.

If experiencing "No valid storage adapters found", please enable cookies for itch.io in general or specifically for this page. Sleepover rules require "cookies", not to track your personal life, but to store saves.
